verses.text: \w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* went \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w together|strong="G1909"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* the \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* of \w prayer|strong="G4335"\w*, \add being\add* the \w ninth|strong="G1766"\w* \add hour\add*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w lame|strong="G5560"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mother’s|strong="G3384"\w* \w womb|strong="G2836"\w* was \w carried|strong="G0941"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* they \w laid|strong="G5087"\w* \w daily|strong="G2250"\w* \w at|strong="G4314"\w* the \w gate|strong="G2374"\w* of the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Beautiful|strong="G5611"\w*, to \w ask|strong="G0154"\w* \w alms|strong="G1654"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w* that \w entered|strong="G1531"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*;

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w seeing|strong="G1492"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w* about \w to|strong="G3195"\w* \w go|strong="G1524"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w* \w asked|strong="G2065"\w* an \w alms|strong="G1654"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, fastening his \w eyes|strong="G0816"\w* \w upon|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Look|strong="G0991"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* gave heed \w unto|strong="G1907"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w expecting|strong="G4328"\w* to \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w something|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Silver|strong="G0694"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w gold|strong="G5553"\w* \w have|strong="G5225"\w* \w I|strong="G3427"\w* \w none|strong="G3756"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* such \w as|strong="G3739"\w* I \w have|strong="G2192"\w* give \w I|strong="G1325"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*: \w In|strong="G1722"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* of \w Nazareth|strong="G3480"\w* rise \w up|strong="G1453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w walk|strong="G4043"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w took|strong="G4084"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w by|strong="G5495"\w* the \w right|strong="G1188"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w lifted|strong="G1453"\w* \add him\add* \w up|strong="G1453"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w immediately|strong="G3916"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w feet|strong="G0939"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* ankle \w bones|strong="G4974"\w* received \w strength|strong="G4732"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2476"\w* leaping \w up|strong="G1814"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w walked|strong="G4043"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, \w walking|strong="G4043"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w leaping|strong="G0242"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w praising|strong="G0134"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w walking|strong="G4043"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w praising|strong="G0134"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*:

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* they \w knew|strong="G1921"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w for|strong="G4314"\w* \w alms|strong="G1654"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* the \w Beautiful|strong="G5611"\w* \w gate|strong="G4439"\w* of the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they were \w filled|strong="G4130"\w* with \w wonder|strong="G2285"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w amazement|strong="G1611"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* that \w which|strong="G3588"\w* had \w happened|strong="G4819"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* as the \w lame|strong="G5560"\w* \w man|strong="G2902"\w* which was \w healed|strong="G2390"\w* \w held|strong="G2902"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w John|strong="G2491"\w*, \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* ran \w together|strong="G4936"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* the \w porch|strong="G4745"\w* that is \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w Solomon’s|strong="G4672"\w*, greatly \w wondering|strong="G1569"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1492"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \add it\add*, he \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, Ye \w men|strong="G0435"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2475"\w*, \w why|strong="G5101"\w* marvel \w ye|strong="G2296"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w*? \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w why|strong="G5101"\w* look ye so \w earnestly|strong="G0816"\w* on \w us|strong="G2254"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* though by \w our|strong="G1411"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w holiness|strong="G2150"\w* we had \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w this|strong="G3588"\w* \w man|strong="G0846"\w* to \w walk|strong="G4043"\w*?

The \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w Isaac|strong="G2464"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="G2384"\w*, the \w God|strong="G2316"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w*, hath \w glorified|strong="G1392"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G3816"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*; \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* delivered \w up|strong="G3860"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w denied|strong="G0720"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* the \w presence|strong="G4383"\w* of \w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w*, \w when|strong="G2919"\w* \w he|strong="G1565"\w* was \w determined|strong="G2919"\w* to \w let|strong="G0630"\w* \add him\add* \w go|strong="G0630"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w denied|strong="G0720"\w* the Holy \w One|strong="G0040"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Just|strong="G1342"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w desired|strong="G0154"\w* a \w murderer|strong="G5406"\w* to be \w granted|strong="G5483"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*;

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w killed|strong="G0615"\w* the \w Prince|strong="G0747"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w raised|strong="G1453"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*; \w whereof|strong="G3739"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w through|strong="G1909"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w in|strong="G3686"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* hath \w made|strong="G4732"\w* this \w man|strong="G5126"\w* \w strong|strong="G4732"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w see|strong="G2334"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w*: \w yea|strong="G2532"\w*, the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* is \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* perfect \w soundness|strong="G3647"\w* in the \w presence|strong="G0561"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, I \w wot|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w through|strong="G2596"\w* \w ignorance|strong="G0052"\w* ye \w did|strong="G4238"\w* \add it\add*, \w as|strong="G5618"\w* \add did\add* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w rulers|strong="G0758"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* those \w things|strong="G3588"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* before had \w shewed|strong="G4293"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*, \w that|strong="G3958"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* should \w suffer|strong="G3958"\w*, he \w hath|strong="G4137"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w*.

¶ Repent \w ye|strong="G3340"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* be \w converted|strong="G1994"\w*, \w that|strong="G1519"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w* may be blotted \w out|strong="G1813"\w*, \w when|strong="G3704"\w* the \w times|strong="G2540"\w* of \w refreshing|strong="G0403"\w* shall \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w presence|strong="G4383"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*;
\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he shall \w send|strong="G0649"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, which before was \w preached|strong="G4296"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*:

\w Whom|strong="G3739"\w* the \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w receive|strong="G1209"\w* \w until|strong="G0891"\w* the \w times|strong="G5550"\w* of \w restitution|strong="G0605"\w* of all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w* of \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* \w since|strong="G0575"\w* the world \w began|strong="G0165"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w* \w truly|strong="G3303"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w*, A \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* \w shall|strong="G0450"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* raise \w up|strong="G0450"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, like \w unto|strong="G5613"\w* \w me|strong="G1691"\w*; \w him|strong="G0846"\w* shall ye \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w in|strong="G2596"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="G3745"\w* he shall \w say|strong="G2980"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* it shall come to \w pass|strong="G2071"\w*, \add that\add* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w soul|strong="G5590"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w will|strong="G0191"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*, shall be \w destroyed|strong="G1842"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* among the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

\w Yea|strong="G1161"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w Samuel|strong="G4545"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* those that follow \w after|strong="G2517"\w*, as many \w as|strong="G3745"\w* have \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w*, \w have|strong="G4293"\w* \w likewise|strong="G2532"\w* \w foretold|strong="G4293"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w Ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G2075"\w* the \w children|strong="G5207"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="G1242"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w made|strong="G1303"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w Abraham|strong="G0011"\w*, \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G4690"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w seed|strong="G4690"\w* \w shall|strong="G1757"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w kindreds|strong="G3965"\w* of the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* be \w blessed|strong="G1757"\w*.

Unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, having raised \w up|strong="G0450"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w Son|strong="G3816"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* to \w bless|strong="G2127"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* turning \w away|strong="G0654"\w* every one of \w you|strong="G1538"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w his|strong="G5216"\w* \w iniquities|strong="G4189"\w*.
